title: Markets Get Time Series Input
description: Input schema for retrieving financial markets time series data for biotech stocks

symbol.description: Financial instrument symbol (ticker) for biotech stocks

interval.description: Data interval/period: daily, weekly, or monthly

period.description: Time period: 1m (1 month), 3m (3 months), 6m (6 months), 1y (1 year), 5y (5 years)

start_date.description: Optional start date for time series (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD). If provided, overrides period parameter.

end_date.description: Optional end date for time series (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today if not provided.
